entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Add MaxValue and MinValue to INumber<TSelf> interface #68120
  • Test failure: Loader\\CollectibleAssemblies\\ResolvedFromDifferentContext\\ResolvedFromDifferentContext\\ResolvedFromDifferentContext.cmd #68112
  • NativeAOT: Run-time simd checking #68110
  • Can we improve ROS<byte>.ToArray from RVA static? #68103

Closed

  • NullableContextAttribute not applied to class methods when multiple methods have same argument type #68047
  • Error in Int16 variables when running in M1 macs #66720
    7.0.0
  • HttpHeaders should not remove invalid values during validating access #67199
    7.0.0
  • JIT: Wrong result computed with forward sub enabled on x64 Windows/Linux #68049
  • System.Diagnostics.Perf_Process.GetProcessById has regressed 50% on Windows #67847

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Remove unneeded unconditional jumps #68119
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add note on where to find ilc #68117
  • Fix CLR_CMAKE_USE_SYSTEM_LIBUNWIND on macOS #68116
    community-contribution
  • Make concurrent reads on HttpHeaders thread-safe #68115
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Don't remove GT_NO_OP "non-removable" NOP #68114
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Fix passing too small args for PUTARG_STK on macOS arm64 ABI #68113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Add {M}IBC to glossary #68111
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • JIT ARM32: Force tailcall nullchecks with LR #68107
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix reading slightly incorrect Zip files #68106
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Enable multiple nested "no GC" region requests #68105
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add retries to ModulesAreDisposedWhenProcessIsDisposed #68104
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process
  • Change Nullable to default to enable in libraries src and ref projects #68102
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono][jit] Add SIMD support for System.Numerics.Vector4. #68098
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Exposing generic math support for unsigned right shift #68096
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Remove StackPush/Pop suffix from helper names in source generated regexes #68099
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Fix passing too small args for PUTARG_STK on macOS arm64 ABI #68108
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • HttpHeaders should not remove invalid values during validating access #67833
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • JIT: fix flags lossage in morph comma/ind interchange #68082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [arm64] Accelerate HexConverter::EncodeToUtf16 #67192
    area-System.Text.Encoding
  • [Group 8] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting` #67511
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Fix off-by-one resize in RegexCompiler #68097
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Move test that uses the network to outerloop #68092
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix typos #68101

Updated

  • Implement Tar APIs #67883
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Add special Comparer/EqualityComparer for Nullable<Enum> #68077
  • Double the size of the previous segment #66930
    area-System.IO.Pipelines
  • vm: Improve getStringLiteral for dynamic context #68055
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improving STJ source generator support for record types #68064
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Use RegexCaseEquivalence table for case-insensitive backreferences #67977
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Retry publish crossgen as AOT (#65948) #67636
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Recursive validation #67810
    area-System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Add single-file debugging fix to DBI #67934
    Servicing-consider, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 6.0.x
  • Make BSWAP16 nodes normalize upper 16 bits #67903
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Do not discard byref zeros in `native int + byref` additions #68086
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [Group 9] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServices` #67512
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • [Group 9] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.Systemd` #67513
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • WIP Arm64: Have CpBlkUnroll and InitBlkUnroll use SIMD registers #68085
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adds Range Manipulation APIs for Collection<T> and ObservableCollection<T> #65101
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution
  • [WIP] ARM64 - Changed GT_MADD to not emit 'msub' #68088
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Expose APIs for getting the exponent and significand for IFloatingPoint types #68094
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Enable UMOD optimization for x64 #68091
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for storing method handle histograms in profiles #67919
    area-crossgen2-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `SkipLocalsInit` property to make the SDK generate `[module: SkipLocalsInit]` #24894

PullRequests

Updated

  • Next set of three test projects to move to Helix. #23975
    Area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-16
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Auto-infer `Span<T>` type for stackalloc in safe contexts. #6024

Updated

  • Proposal: Target typed null coalescing (`??`) expression #2473
    Likely Never
  • Champion "utf8 string literals" #184
    Backlog

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Revisit usage of global SimplifierOptions in IBuiltInAnalyzer.OpenFileOnly #60795
  • Pass fallback options to code generation features #60794
  • CS8352 (span safety rule) on property setter invocation #60791
  • IMethodSymbol doesn't have IsNew #60790

Closed

  • Nothing is suggested after entering comparison operators in `is` pattern matching #58890
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixed crash when moving type from System namespace #60793
    Area-IDE, Community

Merged

  • Suggestion after comparison operators in is pattern matching #60752
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Reorder synchronization code for clarity #60749
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #60798
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to features/required-members #60797
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • [semi-auto-props]: Support assigning properties from constructor #60601
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Code style to convert byte arrays to UTF8 strings #60647
    Area-IDE
  • Show generator produced diagnostics #60474
    Area-IDE
  • Fix up handling for partially written generics #60789
    Area-IDE
  • Simplify the communication between the VS client and OOP further. #60787
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Follow up HTTP/2 items #41224
  • Adding swagger to Blazor Server app break the Blazor Server App. #41223
  • Blazor InputSelect sets wrong selected Option #41222
  • Please use net50 target dll instead of .NETStandard dll in .net runtime shared dlls #41221
  • Hotreload does not updated value from ViewBag #41220

Closed

  • OnInitializedAsync runs on every page load #41200
  • Improve HTTP/2 performance by using Channels #30235
    7.0-preview4
  • Kestrel ignores HostFilteringOptions on first run #41171

PullRequests

Merged

  • HTTP/2 output processing make over #40925
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview4

Updated

  • Add TypedResults static factory class for creating typed IResult objects #41161
    area-web-frameworks
  • Introduce IBindableFromHttpContext<TSelf> #41100
    area-web-frameworks
  • Fix MapPath and UsePathBase's use of implicit PathStrings #41215
    area-runtime
  • Remove SocketException usage #38094
    area-runtime
  • Add linefeed line terminator switch #41101
    area-runtime, 6.0.x

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-16
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Set symstore HTTP retry count in all test cases #3015

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NullReferenceException when Resources/Images contains non-image #6166
  • WebView - assets are not loaded inside html #6165
  • Generate unplated icons on Windows #6164
  • Microsoft.Maui.Resizetizer breaks VS Code #6163
  • ToolbarItem with FontImageSource has different colors on Android and Windows #6162
  • Nested FlexLayout presentation error #6161
  • Checkboxes Have a Default Right Margin of 100 #6160
  • StatusBar Color Control #6159
  • Documentation - loading image only works on Android #6158
  • FlyoutPage Navigation Pane #6157
  • Context menu on wrong position in Windows, crashes in Android #6155
  • Swipe not working when SwipeView is used as base element #6154
  • System.AccessViolationException when using SwipeView in a CollectionView on Windows #6153
  • Cannot swipe on Windows (with mouse) #6152
  • Label Shadow not working correctly on Windows #6150
  • [Shell] [WinUI] TitleView always shows ShellContent title, even if it's set. #6148
    6.0.300-rc.2

Closed

  • Blazor Hybrid: Cannot resolve type for @page from Razor Class Library #6010

PullRequests

Merged

  • Remove old maestro feeds #6131
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, 6.0.300-rc.2

Updated

  • [Blazor] Use static AppOriginUri everywhere #5941
    area/blazor 🕸️

Issues

Updated

  • Cosmos: Support AAD RBAC via the ClientSecretCredential #26491

  • Figure out what to do about SqlClient 4.0 #27183
    7.0.0
  • Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: BackupDatabase() should yield #13834
    Backlog
  • The dotnet dbcontext Scaffold ef and scaffold-dbcontext command does not find the package #27829
